sentences: David Hallyday (born David Michael Benjamin Smet; 14 August 1966) is a French singer, songwriter and amateur sports car racer.
Hallyday was born in Boulogne-Billancourt and is the son of the French singers Sylvie Vartan and Johnny Hallyday.
Hallyday is most known for writing music for others, including a collaboration with his father on the 1999 album Sang pour sang.
Hallyday married Estelle Lef√©bure in 1989; they divorced in 2001.
He married Alexandra Pastor, the daughter of businessman Michel Pastor, in 2004.
Their son Cameron was born on 8 October 2004.
